trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> implementation for referencing SAML2-based security tokens.
trans-unit.target: 表示<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>引用基于 SAML2 安全令牌的实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class for the specified ID.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>类指定的 id。

trans-unit.source: The ID that defines the clause to create.
trans-unit.target: 定义要创建的子句 ID。

trans-unit.source: id is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: id是或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> class for the specified ID, nonce, and key size.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.Saml2AssertionKeyIdentifierClause"></xref>指定 ID 的类、 nonce，和密钥大小。

trans-unit.source: The ID that defines the clause to create.
trans-unit.target: 定义要创建的子句 ID。

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref:System.Byte> that contains the nonce that was used to create a derived key.
trans-unit.target: 数组<xref:System.Byte>，包含用于创建派生的密钥的 nonce。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: Sets the value that is returned by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*> method.
trans-unit.target: 设置返回的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>方法。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.GetDerivationNonce*>

trans-unit.source: The size of the derived key.
trans-unit.target: 派生密钥的大小。

trans-unit.source: Sets the value of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*> property.
trans-unit.target: 设置的值<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>属性。</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause.DerivationLength*>

trans-unit.source: id is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: id是或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for this instance is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示此实例的密钥标识符是否等效于指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>要进行比较。

trans-unit.source: if keyIdentifierClause is the same instance as the current instance; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: 如果 keyIdentifierClause 是相同的实例与当前实例; 否则为 。

trans-unit.source: Returns a value that indicates whether the key identifier for an assertion is equivalent to the specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个值，该值指示断言的密钥标识符是否等效于指定的密钥标识符子句。

trans-unit.source: The ID of the assertion.
trans-unit.target: 该断言的 ID。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"></xref> to compare to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKeyIdentifierClause"> </xref>要进行比较。

trans-unit.source: if assertionId matches the property of keyIdentifierClause; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: if assertionId matches the property of keyIdentifierClause; otherwise, .

trans-unit.source: assertionId is or an empty string.
trans-unit.target: assertionId是或空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that represents the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示当前实例的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: 当前实例的字符串表示形式。
